extendedInfo.description: Number 1 iOS app now for Androidð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥GET IT WHILE ITS FREE & HOT!!!!ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥ð¥NOW 5 APPS IN 1ð¥ð¥ââââââââââââââââââââââððSMS PICS & ANIMATED EMOTICONS & EMOJI 2 ARTððââââââââââââââââââââââWith Text Pictures, Animated Emoticons and Emoji Art you can:â Easily Decorate your Text Messages and Emailsâ Add Emoji art flavor to your Notesâ Submit App Store reviews with cute art and picturesâ Insert smiles in any other text app including Facebook or Twitter.â Copy to text, email, clip board or add to favoritesâ Picture text art has fun filled categories with 1000âs of Cool Pics to choose fromâ Endless possibilities symbols, vehicles, sports, people, music, smileys, animals, frames, emoticons and many more!â Tons of entertaining, crazy, adorable, witty, humorous and lovable animated Emoticons.â Express your-self with exciting Emoji art!ââââââââââââââââââââââððPHOTO COLLAGE MAKERððââââââââââââââââââââââWeâve now added Emoticon Photo Collage Maker.Now you can add Custom Clip Art to all your favorite photos and make neat collages for Instagram, Facebook, or just to share with friends through text or email. The Photo Collage is packed with awesome features and FX filters making all your photos something to talk about.Here is a list of some of the features that Emoticon Photo Collage Maker offers:â 12fx Photo Effectsâ Cool Effects allows you to rotate and or flip picturesâ Add a tint of colorâ Adjust Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Sharpnessâ Draw Featuresâ Add Meme'sâ Adjust lighting and balanceâ Crop / Adjust picture with 13 preset sizes or use your own custom sizeâ Redeye reductionâ Touch up Optionâ Over 30 unique frame borders,â 20 different custom photo collage layoutsâ Decorate photos with over 100 Clip Art Images for Xmas, Thanksgiving, New Years (More too come)â Choice of 40 different Artistic Fontsâ Load pictures from device camera or photo albumâ Save to Camera Roll, Upload to Instagram or Email to Friendsâ Many, Many, MoreââââââââââââââââââââââððCLIP ART EMOTION FACES FOR SMS, TEXT, EMAIL, TWITTER AND FACEBOOKððââââââââââââââââââââââiPod users: Custom Emotion Clip Art can be used for everything (email, notes etc) except SMS text messaging.Emoji 2 Art ALSO comes with 1200+ Custom Emotion Clip Art that you can share with your friends over text messages, facebook, twitter and emails.With Custom Smiley Clip Art you can:â Easily Decorate your Text Messages and Emails with over 1200+ Custom made Emotion clip arts.â Add Custom Emotion clip art faces and pictures flavor to your Notesâ Insert custom Emotion clip art faces in any other text appâ Email, text and send over 975 custom Emotion themed clip art: Thanksgiving, Halloween, Christmas, New Years and many more!Check it out now for FREE!
